item.name: Suppress Growl warning
item.appendix: This option suppresses the warning: "Growl is not running"
If you want to suppress the Growl notification itself,
disable the notification of KeyRemap4MacBook from Growl Preferences.

item.name: Don't remap keyboards which has third vendor's driver
Don't remap pointing devices which has third vendor's driver
Pass-Through CapsLock LED status
item.appendix: (Don't enable this when you use "XXX to CapsLock")

item.name: Don't restore modifiers in the mouse event
item.appendix: For example, when you use Option+Tab to Command+Tab,
we send "Command+Click" when you did a mouse click while
pushing the Option key after you pushed Option+Tab.
"Option+Click" should be output, but this option changes this behavior.

item.name: Disable NumPad Hack
item.appendix: (Don't change Fn+JKL.. to NumPad, and other Fn+key combinations)

item.name: Pass Through Mode (Disable all settings temporarily)
What is Pass Through Mode?
item.appendix: You can disable all settings temporarily.
Turn on a setting below, and toggle "Pass Through Mode".

item.name: Change Fn+Escape to toggle "Pass Through Mode"
Simultaneous Key Presses [Escape+Tab] to toggle "Pass Through Mode"
Holding Escape to toggle "Pass Through Mode"
Enable at only Remote Desktop Connection Client
Enable at only World of Warcraft
Swap Command and Option for Alt Bindings
Prevent accidental close of chat windows
item.appendix: (Ignore Command+W and require Command+Shift+W to send Command+W)

item.name: Hold Command+W to Close Conversation
item.appendix: (You can adjust the threshold time of holding by
"[Holding Key to Key] Holding Threshold" in Key Repeat tab.)
item.autogen: --HoldingKeyToKey-- KeyCode::W, VK_COMMAND | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::VK_NONE, KeyCode::W, VK_COMMAND, Option::NOREPEAT

item.name: Do not let Dictionary.app quit on Command+W
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::W, VK_COMMAND | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::TAB, VK_COMMAND, KeyCode::RETURN, Option::NOREPEAT

item.name: Emacs bindings for TweetDeck
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::K, VK_CONTROL, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::FORWARD_DELETE

item.appendix: This mode is designed for Quicksilver.app.

item.name: Use PC Style "Change Input Method" #1
item.appendix: If you want to use Option_L+Shift_L as modifier, press Shift_L first. (then press Option_L.)

item.name: Use PC Style "Change Input Method" #2
item.appendix: If you want to use Option+Shift as modifier, press Shift first. (then press Option.)

item.name: Swap U and I (== Swap Qwerty::F and Qwerty::G)
Make Cut, Quit work on Mac OS X using Dvorak layout in the same position as on QWERTY
item.appendix: Change Command_L+Q to Command_L+X (X in DV - i.e. Cut)
Change Command_L+' to Command_L+Q (Q in DV - i.e. Quit)

item.name: Make Undo work on Mac OS X using Dvorak layout in the same position as on QWERTY (;)
item.appendix: Change Command_L+; to Command_L+Z (Z in DV - i.e. Undo)

item.name: Make Cut, Copy, Paste, Quit and Undo work on Mac OS X using Dvorak layout
item.appendix: in the same position as on QWERTY
Change Command_L+Q to Command_L+X (X in DV - i.e. Cut)
Change Command_L+J to Command_L+C (C in DV - i.e. Copy)
Change Command_L+K to Command_L+V (V in DV - i.e. Paste)
Change Command_L+; to Command_L+Z (Z in DV - i.e. Undo)
Change Command_L+' to Command_L+Q (Q in DV - i.e. Quit)

item.name: Use Dvorak - Qwerty Keyboard Layout
